tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE space_transactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mission (
  mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  launch_date DATE,
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE expense (
  expense_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id INT,
  expense_date DATE,
  expense_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES mission(mission_id)
)

CREATE TABLE astronaut (
  astronaut_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  mission_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES mission(mission_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SpaceProjects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  project_budget DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES SpaceProjects(project_id),
  expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
  expense_description TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Astronauts (
  astronaut_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  astronaut_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  astronaut_age INTEGER,
  astronaut_specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MissionLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID REFERENCES SpaceProjects(project_id),
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_entry TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  description VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(100),
  project_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  project_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);
